author: David Preston
title: Best Bond Henchmen / Minor Villains
text:
Home » News » Entertainment » Best Bond Henchmen /… Best Bond Henchmen / Minor Villains By David Preston | @davpresto October 16, 2015 4:06 am WTOP's Dave Preston ranks the Best Bond Henchmen & Minor Villains. 
Introduction 
It is here that our Bond series runs into a unique division of labor, as most supervillains boast not just henchmen but minor villains. 
A henchman/henchwoman is usually a silent but sinister type who handles most of the physical demands (i.e. killings). 
The minor villain is more of a logistics manager, although both have been known to cross over (i.e. Oddjob disposing of Mr. Solo’s body via car-crusher or Irma Bunt shooting 007’s wife). 
The demands of a modern criminal organization call for versatility in roles and responsibilities. So who are the Best Henchmen and Minor Villains? 
Click here to reach the table of contents for all of our Bond rankings.
